## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the relevant option with an "x" -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Refactoring (code changes that neither fix a bug nor add a feature)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Code style/formatting update
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Configuration changes

## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have removed any console.log statements and debugging code
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run ESLint and fixed all linting issues
- [ ] I have run Prettier to format my code

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers/devices (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated comments in the code
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have added new dependencies (if any) and documented why they're needed
- [ ] I have checked for dependency vulnerabilities using `npm audit`
- [ ] All dependencies are still compatible with the project

### Performance

- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] I have optimized images and assets (if applicable)
- [ ] I have checked for memory leaks
- [ ] I have tested page load times

### Security

- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have validated and sanitized user inputs
- [ ] I have followed security best practices
- [ ] I have checked for common vulnerabilities (XSS, CSRF, etc.)

### Accessibility

- [ ] I have tested with keyboard navigation
- [ ] I have added appropriate ARIA labels
- [ ] I have tested with screen readers (if applicable)
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG standards
